Rare Special Items.name: ★ Stiletto Knife | Urban Masked
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been spray-painted using a tangle of masking tape as a stencil.
Rare Special Items.lore: True power is demonstrated with subtle application

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Stiletto Knife | Safari Mesh
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been spray-painted using mesh fencing and cardboard cutouts as stencils.
Rare Special Items.lore: A predator is a predator, no matter the environment

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Ursus Knife | ★ (Vanilla)
Rare Special Items.desc: This item has no description.
Rare Special Items.lore: This item has no Lore

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Navaja Knife | Fade
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been painted by airbrushing transparent paints that fade together over a chrome base coat.
Rare Special Items.lore: This isn't just a weapon, it's a conversation piece - Imogen, Arms Dealer In Training

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Talon Knife | Blue Steel
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been cold blued.
Rare Special Items.lore: This is the malbec of weapon design - Booth, Arms Dealer

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Stiletto Knife | Stained
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been given a forced patina using lemon and mustard dripped onto the surface.
Rare Special Items.lore: If you think it's messy now, wait until you see it under a blacklight

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Ursus Knife | Case Hardened
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been color case-hardened through the application of wood charcoal at high temperatures.
Rare Special Items.lore: A little color never hurt anyone

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Ursus Knife | Night Stripe
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been spray-painted with a tape mask pattern in a night ops color scheme.
Rare Special Items.lore: Spray... Pray... Paint... Stab.

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Stiletto Knife | Night Stripe
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been spray-painted with a tape mask pattern in a night ops color scheme.
Rare Special Items.lore: Spray... Pray... Paint... Stab.

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Talon Knife | Boreal Forest
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been painted using a forest camouflage hydrographic.
Rare Special Items.lore: The woods can be a dangerous place... never travel alone

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Talon Knife | Scorched
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been spray-painted in a sun-dappled pattern.

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Navaja Knife | Crimson Web
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been painted using a spider web-patterned hydrographic over a red base coat and finished with a semi-gloss topcoat.
Rare Special Items.lore: Be careful where you walk, you never know where the web is spread

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Stiletto Knife | Slaughter
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been painted in a zebra-stripe pattern with aluminum and chrome paints with various reflectivities, and has then been covered with a tomato red candy coat.
Rare Special Items.lore: Valeria doesn't pay Javier to ask questions... she pays him to pry out answers

Covert Skins.name: Desert Eagle | Code Red
Covert Skins.desc: A custom paint job with a bright red base and white detailing has been applied.

Covert Skins.name: AK-47 | Neon Rider
Covert Skins.desc: A deadly biker can be seen in the foreground of various neon, blended patterns.
Covert Skins.lore: Two parts Trapper Keeper, three parts synthesizer

Classified Skins.name: Sawed-Off | Devourer
Classified Skins.desc: It has been hand painted to resemble a creature eating its words.
Classified Skins.lore: It’s rude to talk with food in your mouth

Classified Skins.name: M4A1-S | Nightmare
Classified Skins.desc: A custom paint job depicting a frightening nocturnal visitor has been applied.

Classified Skins.name: FAMAS | Eye of Athena
Classified Skins.desc: A hand painted mechanized owl sits atop a nest of orange and brown feathers.

Restricted Skins.name: CZ75-Auto | Eco
Restricted Skins.desc: It has heat-transferred decals applied to a white and green base.

Restricted Skins.name: MP7 | Powercore
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been custom painted with a green base and yellow highlights.
Restricted Skins.lore: Rule No. 2 – Never clash in public

Restricted Skins.name: G3SG1 | High Seas
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been custom painted with a nautical theme and decorative brass metal work.
Restricted Skins.lore: Let dead reckoning be your guide

Restricted Skins.name: Nova | Toy Soldier
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been hand painted a familiar shade of green to evoke childhood memories.
Restricted Skins.lore: Pellets and soldiers delivered in bulk

Restricted Skins.name: AWP | PAW
Restricted Skins.desc: A pattern of felines, K-9s, and a creature with a red scarf has been applied.
Restricted Skins.lore: Kill rewards paid in scratching posts and tennis balls

Mil-Spec Skins.name: Tec-9 | Snek-9
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: A custom paint job inspired by coral snakes has been applied.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: "If red meets yellow, you're a dead fellow"

Mil-Spec Skins.name: P90 | Traction
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been custom painted with sectioned blue hexagons designed to fit the P90’s unique shape.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: Half the battle is keeping a hold of the weapon; the other half is hitting the target

Mil-Spec Skins.name: Dual Berettas | Shred
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been spray painted with white and blue streaks on a black base.

Mil-Spec Skins.name: AUG | Amber Slipstream
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been hand painted with a smoky grey and vibrant orange hydrographic.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: Please keep your hands and arms inside the vehicle

Mil-Spec Skins.name: MP9 | Capillary
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: A custom paint job comprised of intricate teal and coral veins has been applied.

Mil-Spec Skins.name: Glock-18 | Warhawk
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: A custom paint job reminiscent of a previous era’s war planes has been applied.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: It may not the best plane on deck, but it is the most readily available

Mil-Spec Skins.name: R8 Revolver | Survivalist
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: Hand painted green stripes allow the owner to blend in and avoid detection in tense situations.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: "Eight shots and multiple enemies; better make them count"
